sqls.sql:
SELECT id,
CASE category_id WHEN '0' THEN '经营单位' WHEN '1' THEN '生产单位' ELSE '其他' END as category_name,
CASE settlement_id WHEN '0' THEN '现金' WHEN '1' THEN '月票' WHEN '2' THEN '支票' ELSE '其他' END as settlement_name,
area_code, pinyin_code, code, name, address, contact, tel, bank_code, bank_name, bank_account, business_license_code, business_license_date, business_license_expire_date, business_license_approval, license_code, license_date, license_expire_date, license_name, consigner, consign_date, consign_expire_date, quality_license_expire_date, health_license_expire_date, gsp_code, gsp_date, gsp_expire_date, gmp_one_code, gmp_one_date, gmp_one_expire_date, gmp_two_code, gmp_two_date, gmp_two_expire_date, business_scope, business_scopename, quality_head, certification_scope, tax_registration_code, registered_capital, business_pattern, economic_nature, legal_person,
CASE has_annual_inspection WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '其他' END as has_annual_inspection,
CASE has_seal WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '其他' END as has_seal,
CASE has_manifest WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '其他' END as has_manifest,
oraganization_code_expire_date, annual_output_value, quality_manager_count, business_approval_user_id, business_approval_user_name,
CASE business_approval_status WHEN '0' THEN '待审核' WHEN '1' THEN '驳回' WHEN '2' THEN '通过' ELSE '其他' END as business_approval_status,
business_approval_time, quality_manager_approval_user_id, quality_manager_approval_user_name,
CASE quality_manager_approval_status WHEN '0' THEN '待审核' WHEN '1' THEN '驳回' WHEN '2' THEN '通过' ELSE '其他' END as quality_manager_approval_status,
quality_manager_approval_time, quality_approval_user_id, quality_approval_user_name,
CASE quality_approval_status WHEN '0' THEN '待审核' WHEN '1' THEN '驳回' WHEN '2' THEN '通过' ELSE '其他' END as quality_approval_status,
quality_approval_time, creater_name, modifier_name, create_date, update_date FROM saas_supplier where 1=1 and delete_state = '0'
and create_date >= ${startTime}
and create_date <= ${endTime}
and name like %${name}%
and category_id like %${category_id}%
and pinyin_code like %${pinyin_code}%
and creater_name like %${creater_name}%
order by update_date desc

SELECT id, category_id,
CASE category_id WHEN '0' THEN '经营单位' WHEN '1' THEN '生产单位' ELSE '其他' END as category_name,
settlement_id,
CASE settlement_id WHEN '0' THEN '现金' WHEN '1' THEN '月票' WHEN '2' THEN '支票' ELSE '其他' END as settlement_name,
area_code, pinyin_code, code, name, address, contact, tel, bank_code, bank_name, bank_account, business_license_code, business_license_date, business_license_expire_date, business_license_approval, license_code, license_date, license_expire_date, license_name, consigner, consign_date, consign_expire_date, quality_license_expire_date, health_license_expire_date, gsp_code, gsp_date, gsp_expire_date, gmp_one_code, gmp_one_date, gmp_one_expire_date, gmp_two_code, gmp_two_date, gmp_two_expire_date, business_scope, business_scopename, quality_head, certification_scope, tax_registration_code, registered_capital, business_pattern, economic_nature, legal_person,
CASE has_annual_inspection WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '其他' END as has_annual_inspection,
CASE has_seal WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '其他' END as has_seal,
CASE has_manifest WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '其他' END as has_manifest,
oraganization_code_expire_date, annual_output_value, quality_manager_count, business_approval_user_id, business_approval_user_name,
CASE business_approval_status WHEN '0' THEN '待审核' WHEN '1' THEN '驳回' WHEN '2' THEN '通过' ELSE '其他' END as business_approval_status,
business_approval_time, quality_manager_approval_user_id, quality_manager_approval_user_name,
CASE quality_manager_approval_status WHEN '0' THEN '待审核' WHEN '1' THEN '驳回' WHEN '2' THEN '通过' ELSE '其他' END as quality_manager_approval_status,
quality_manager_approval_time, quality_approval_user_id, quality_approval_user_name,
CASE quality_approval_status WHEN '0' THEN '待审核' WHEN '1' THEN '驳回' WHEN '2' THEN '通过' ELSE '其他' END as quality_approval_status,
quality_approval_time, creater_name, modifier_name, create_date, update_date FROM detail_test where 1=1 and su_id=${key} order by update_date desc

insert into saas_supplier(
category_id,
category_name,
settlement_id,
settlement_name,
area_code,
pinyin_code,
code,
name,
address,
contact,
tel,
bank_code,
bank_name,
bank_account,
business_license_code,
business_license_date,
business_license_expire_date,
business_license_approval,
license_code,
license_date,
license_expire_date,
license_name,
consigner,
consign_date,
consign_expire_date,
quality_license_expire_date,
health_license_expire_date,
gsp_code,
gsp_date,
gsp_expire_date,
gmp_one_code,
gmp_one_date,
gmp_one_expire_date,
gmp_two_code,
gmp_two_date,
gmp_two_expire_date,
business_scope,
business_scopename,
quality_head,
certification_scope,
tax_registration_code,
registered_capital,
business_pattern,
economic_nature,
legal_person,
has_annual_inspection,
has_seal,
has_manifest,
oraganization_code_expire_date,
annual_output_value,
quality_manager_count,
business_approval_user_id,
business_approval_user_name,
business_approval_status,
business_approval_time,
quality_manager_approval_user_id,
quality_manager_approval_user_name,
quality_manager_approval_status,
quality_manager_approval_time,
quality_approval_user_id,
quality_approval_user_name,
quality_approval_status,
quality_approval_time,
creater_id,
creater_name,
modifier_id,
modifier_name,
create_date, update_date, ) values(
${category_id},
${category_name},
${settlement_id},
${settlement_name},
${area_code},
${pinyin_code},
${code},
${name},
${address},
${contact},
${tel},
${bank_code},
${bank_name},
${bank_account},
${business_license_code},
${business_license_date},
${business_license_expire_date},
${business_license_approval},
${license_code},
${license_date},
${license_expire_date},
${license_name},
${consigner},
${consign_date},
${consign_expire_date},
${quality_license_expire_date},
${health_license_expire_date},
${gsp_code},
${gsp_date},
${gsp_expire_date},
${gmp_one_code},
${gmp_one_date},
${gmp_one_expire_date},
${gmp_two_code},
${gmp_two_date},
${gmp_two_expire_date},
${business_scope},
${business_scopename},
${quality_head},
${certification_scope},
${tax_registration_code},
${registered_capital},
${business_pattern},
${economic_nature},
${legal_person},
${has_annual_inspection},
${has_seal},
${has_manifest},
${oraganization_code_expire_date},
${annual_output_value},
${quality_manager_count},
${business_approval_user_id},
${business_approval_user_name},
${business_approval_status},
${business_approval_time},
${quality_manager_approval_user_id},
${quality_manager_approval_user_name},
${quality_manager_approval_status},
${quality_manager_approval_time},
${quality_approval_user_id},
${quality_approval_user_name},
${quality_approval_status},
${quality_approval_time},
${creater_id},
${creater_name},
${modifier_id},
${modifier_name},
now(), now(), )

insert into detail_test(
su_id,
category_id,
category_name,
settlement_id,
settlement_name,
area_code,
pinyin_code,
code,
name,
address,
contact,
tel,
bank_code,
bank_name,
bank_account,
business_license_code,
business_license_date,
business_license_expire_date,
business_license_approval,
license_code,
license_date,
license_expire_date,
license_name,
) values(
${keyProperty},
${test8.category_id},
${test8.category_name},
${test8.settlement_id},
${test8.settlement_name},
${test8.area_code},
${test8.pinyin_code},
${test8.code},
${test8.name},
${test8.address},
${test8.contact},
${test8.tel},
${test8.bank_code},
${test8.bank_name},
${test8.bank_account},
${test8.business_license_code},
${test8.business_license_date},
${test8.business_license_expire_date},
${test8.business_license_approval},
${test8.license_code},
${test8.license_date},
${test8.license_expire_date},
${test8.license_name},
)

update saas_supplier set
category_id=${category_id},
category_name=${category_name},
settlement_id=${settlement_id},
settlement_name=${settlement_name},
area_code=${area_code},
pinyin_code=${pinyin_code},
name=${name},
code=${code},
address=${address},
contact=${contact},
tel=${tel},
bank_code=${bank_code},
bank_name=${bank_name},
bank_account=${bank_account},
business_license_code=${business_license_code},
business_license_date=${business_license_date},
business_license_expire_date=${business_license_expire_date},
business_license_approval=${business_license_approval},
license_code=${license_code},
license_date=${license_date},
license_expire_date=${license_expire_date},
license_name=${license_name},
consigner=${consigner},
consign_date=${consign_date},
consign_expire_date=${consign_expire_date},
quality_license_expire_date=${quality_license_expire_date},
health_license_expire_date=${health_license_expire_date},
gsp_code=${gsp_code},
gsp_date=${gsp_date},
gsp_expire_date=${gsp_expire_date},
gmp_one_code=${gmp_one_code},
gmp_one_date=${gmp_one_date},
gmp_one_expire_date=${gmp_one_expire_date},
gmp_two_code=${gmp_two_code},
gmp_two_date=${gmp_two_date},
gmp_two_expire_date=${gmp_two_expire_date},
business_scope=${business_scope},
business_scopename=${business_scopename},
quality_head=${quality_head},
certification_scope=${certification_scope},
tax_registration_code=${tax_registration_code},
registered_capital=${registered_capital},
business_pattern=${business_pattern},
economic_nature=${economic_nature},
legal_person=${legal_person},
has_annual_inspection=${has_annual_inspection},
has_seal=${has_seal},
has_manifest=${has_manifest},
oraganization_code_expire_date=${oraganization_code_expire_date},
annual_output_value=${annual_output_value},
quality_manager_count=${quality_manager_count},
business_approval_user_id=${business_approval_user_id},
business_approval_user_name=${business_approval_user_name},
business_approval_status=${business_approval_status},
business_approval_time=${business_approval_time},
quality_manager_approval_user_id=${quality_manager_approval_user_id},
quality_manager_approval_user_name=${quality_manager_approval_user_name},
quality_manager_approval_status=${quality_manager_approval_status},
quality_manager_approval_time=${quality_manager_approval_time},
quality_approval_user_id=${quality_approval_user_id},
quality_approval_user_name=${quality_approval_user_name},
quality_approval_status=${quality_approval_status},
quality_approval_time=${quality_approval_time},
modifier_id=${modifier_id},
modifier_name=${modifier_name},
update_date=now(), where id=${key}

update saas_supplier set delete_state = '1' where
id= ${id}

condition.title: 类别
condition.name: category_id
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from saas_dictionary a where a.code = 'category_id'
